sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { isLogged } from '../redux/actions' const Profile = ({ profile }) => { const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const logOut = () => { let token = sessionStorage.Token; axios .post( `${Baseurl}auth/logout`, {}, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, } ) .then((res) => { if (res.data.message) { history.push("/login"); dispatch(isLogged(false)); sessionStorage.removeItem("Token"); } }); }; return ( <>
{profile.firstname ? profile.firstname : } {profile.lastname}
{`Earnings: â‚¦${profile.earnings ? profile.earnings : 0}`}
Withdraw
Information

Email

{profile.email ? profile.email : }

Phone

{profile.phone ? profile.phone : }
Settings
Account
Account Settings
Logout
) } export default Profile
